textBlock.heading: The payments app to sell anything, anywhere
textBlock.text: Let your customers pay online or in-person using payment links, QR codes, Apple Pay, Google Pay, and process cards from all major card networks

featuresSection.heading: You do the business, we'll handle the money
featuresSection.text: Everything you need to sell anything, process card payments, and grow your business anywhere on the planet, minus the headache of dealing with clunky hardware, messy contracts, and unkept promises
